Headline: Normal Brown Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Normal service on the Brown Line is resuming following an earlier loss of track power near Merchandise Mart.   Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Normal service on the Brown Line is resuming following an earlier loss of track power near Merchandise Mart.  

All trains resume normal stops at Merchandise Mart.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Illinois Medical District
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Illinois Medical District due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Illinois Medical District due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
